text:
How would you merge 2 dataframes in the following situation? :
DataFrame A has 2 columns, DataFrame B has 3 columns but both DataFrame A and B share some rows in their first column.

After merging, I'd like to have a DataFrame with a total of 4 columns which only keeps the rows that DataFrame A and B have in common in their first column.

elements.text:
